hanzi-su-wiki:
愛

Значения

Любовь; любить; любимый

Мнемоника

Желание снять 爫 покров 冖 с сердца 心, вызвать симпатию, что бывает тяжело 夂.

Варианты

爱
purpleculture_pinyin:
ài
to love; to be fond of; to like; affection; to be inclined (to do sth); to tend to (happen)
любить; увлекаться; нравится; привязанность; быть склонным (делать что-то); стремиться (происходить)

heisig_chinese_memo: If you really love someone, you won't keep them in a cage-like birdhouse relationship, but rather open the door and let their heart walk around freely.
heisig_constituent: love, birdhouse, birdcage, claw, vulture, crown, love birds, heart, walking legs
koohiiStory1: If you really love someone, you won´t keep them in a cage-like bird house relationship, but rather open the door and let their heart walk around freely. Think less about "I" (あい) and more about "we".
koohiiStory2: The man is about to enter the ´birdhouse´ (brothel) when he remembers his true love at home, and, following his heart, uses his walking legs to go straight home.
jp_example_words:
愛想(あいそ): civility, courtesy, compliments, sociability, graces
愛憎(あいにく): likes and dislikes
可愛い(かわいい): pretty, cute, lovely, charming, dear, darling, pet
可愛がる(かわいがる): to love, to be affectionate
可愛らしい(かわいらしい): lovely, sweet
愛でたい(めでたい): auspicious
恋愛(れんあい): love, love-making, passion, emotion, affections
愛(あい): love
愛情(あいじょう): love, affection
愛する(あいする): to love
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Putting on cleats in the heart of winter and braving the harsh elements just to plant a kiss on your sweetheart’s forehead – that’s love. Sure, you could see them another day, but you need to plant this smooch on their forehead today, so you get some cleats for better grip on the winter snow and you keep thoughts of your dear in your heart as you travel to see your love.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Feel the joy of love in your heart as you travel out in the winter. It’s cold outside, but the feeling of love in your heart keeps you warm. Feel this warm love emanating and heating your body.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Walking through the winter snows with your cleats on, you’ve gotta keep your eye (あい) on the prize. It’s a really hard journey, but you keep your eye on the prize, which is your love and the time you’ll get to spend with them.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine seeing your love with your own two eyes after a long time away from them. It feels great to be reunited and see eye to eye once again. Imagine this feeling.
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 夂 (зима), 心 (сердце), 爪 (ноготь)
Ru_trainchinese: ài: (глаг/сущ) любить; быть склонным к; любовь
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you go (夂) to your covered (冖) heart (心) to claw (⺤) love
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Bird friends make lots of love in the birdhouse.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (思, si=ssu, think) describes a head with a knot which has a complex thought (x). There is a heart which means emotions in below the character. The ancients believed that human emotions came from the heart, and complex and logical thoughts come from head. This character is a combination of thoughts and emotions that have mixed feelings of mind and soul. (愛, 爱, ai, love) A person stands tall, with his/her mouth widely opened , breathing long (like Yawning) with heart (心) in it, and with a foot down to the designated place (夊) below. It describes one’s mind heartily heads to one’s loved one.
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " love " is benevolence. "Said Wen": "㤅, Hui also. From the heart, the sound. 𢟪, ancient prose." Zhu Min, "Pretend to Be Borrowed for Meaning": "The characters of Jin Hui are all borrowed from the word "Love" and 㤅 is abolished, that is, the original meaning of love is also Abolished." "Guang Ya. "Exegesis": "Love, benevolence." The Qin bamboo slips add "夊" from the lower part of the human figure. According to the ancient characters, the lower part of the human figure is often added from the form of " zhi ", which is the origin of the word " love " in the small seal. "Said Wen": "Love, Xing Yan. Cong Kui, 㤅 sound."

Bronze inscription expresses benevolence, Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "City (love)".

" Love " expresses the feeling that people like each other, and this feeling is expressed very broadly. Ancient books have corresponding records of various emotional categories of " love ." "Zuo Zhuan. "Yin A.D.": "Love the uncle, want to establish it", this is the love between parents and children, which means loving kindness; "Xunzi. "Tian Lun": "Emphasize the law to love the people and hegemony", this means that the monarch loves his subjects, which means love and care; Su Wu's "Four Poems": "We must be a husband and wife, and there is no doubt about love", this is the love of husband and wife, which means love; "Zuo Zhuan. Twenty-two Years of Xi Gong: "If you love serious wounds, then do not hurt." This is the love of the strong for the weak, expressing compassion and love. The whole sentence means that if you love the serious wounds and do not kill (the enemy), then you do not kill. They are the same.
humanum_short_description_en: " Love " is composed of "㤅" in bronze . From the sound of " heart " and "兂", the original meaning is benevolence.
humanum_full_description:
「愛」的本義是仁愛。《說文》：「㤅，惠也。从心，兂聲。𢟪，古文。」朱珔《假借義證》：「今惠㤅字皆借愛字為之而㤅廢，即愛之本義亦廢矣。」《廣雅．釋詁》：「愛，仁也。」秦簡文字下加從倒止「夊」，按古文字人形下部往往加從「止」形，為小篆「愛」字所本。《說文》：「愛，行皃。从夊，㤅聲。」

　　金文表示仁愛，中山王圓壺：「慈㤅(愛)」。

　　「愛」表達人與人之間相互喜歡的感情，這種感情表示得非常廣泛，古書對「愛」之各種情感範疇有相應的記錄。《左傳．隱公元年》：「愛共叔段，欲立之」，此為親子之愛，表示慈愛；《荀子．天論》：「重法愛民而霸」，此為君主愛臣民，意謂愛護；蘇武《詩四首》：「結髮為夫妻，恩愛兩不疑」，此為夫妻之愛，表示恩愛；《左傳．僖公二十二年》：「若愛重傷，則如勿傷」，此為強者對弱者的愛，表示憐愛，全句意謂如若憐愛其重傷而不去殺害（敵人），則跟沒有殺害他們一樣。
humanum_short_description: 「愛」金文作「㤅」，從「心」，「兂」聲，本義是仁愛。

①對人或事有深摯的感情：喜愛。愛慕。愛情。愛戴。愛撫。愛憐。愛戀。愛莫能助(雖同情並願意幫助，但力量做不到)。友愛。摯愛。仁愛。厚愛。熱愛。
②喜好(hào)：愛好(hào)。愛唱歌。
③容易：鐵愛生鏽。
④重視而加以保護：愛護。愛惜。
⑤吝惜：“百姓皆以王爲愛也”。

「 愛 」的本義是仁愛。《說文》：「㤅，惠也。从心，兂聲。𢟪，古文。」朱珔《假借義證》：「今惠㤅字皆借愛字為之而㤅廢，即愛之本義亦廢矣。」《廣雅．釋詁》：「愛，仁也。」秦簡文字下加從倒止「 夊 」，按古文字人形下部往往加從「 止 」形，為小篆「 愛 」字所本。《說文》：「愛，行皃。从夊，㤅聲。」 金文表示仁愛，中山王圓壺：「慈㤅(愛)」。 「 愛 」表達人與人之間相互喜歡的感情，這種感情表示得非常廣泛，古書對「 愛 」之各種情感範疇有相應的記錄。《左傳．隱公元年》：「愛共叔段，欲立之」，此為親子之愛，表示慈愛；《荀子．天論》：「重法愛民而霸」，此為君主愛臣民，意謂愛護；蘇武《詩四首》：「結髮為夫妻，恩愛兩不疑」，此為夫妻之愛，表示恩愛；《左傳．僖公二十二年》：「若愛重傷，則如勿傷」，此為強者對弱者的愛，表示憐愛，全句意謂如若憐愛其重傷而不去殺害（敵人），則跟沒有殺害他們一樣。
The original meaning of " love" is benevolence. "Said Wen": "㤅, Hui also. From the heart, the sound. 𢟪, ancient prose." Zhu Min, "Pretend to Be Borrowed for Meaning": "The characters of Jin Hui are all borrowed from the word "Love" and 㤅 is abolished, that is, the original meaning of love is also Abolished." "Guang Ya. "Exegesis": "Love, benevolence." The Qin bamboo slips add " 夊" from the lower part of the human figure. According to the ancient characters, the lower part of the human figure is often added from the form of " zhi", which is the origin of the word " love" in the small seal. "Said Wen": "Love, Xing Yan. Cong Kui, 㤅 sound." Bronze inscription expresses benevolence, Zhongshan Wang Yuanhu: "City (love)". " Love" expresses the feeling that people like each other, and this feeling is expressed very broadly. Ancient books have corresponding records of various emotional categories of " love." "Zuo Zhuan. "Yin A.D.": "Love the uncle, want to establish it", this is the love between parents and children, which means loving kindness; "Xunzi. "Tian Lun": "Emphasize the law to love the people and hegemony", this means that the monarch loves his subjects, which means love and care; Su Wu's "Four Poems": "We must be a husband and wife, and there is no doubt about love", this is the love of husband and wife, which means love; "Zuo Zhuan. Twenty-two Years of Xi Gong: "If you love serious wounds, then do not hurt." This is the love of the strong for the weak, expressing compassion and love. The whole sentence means that if you love the serious wounds and do not kill (the enemy), then you do not kill. They are the same.

愛字的基本解释

愛
ài
见“爱”。

愛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ài］
［《廣韻》烏代切，去代，影。］
“爱1”的繁体字。
(1)待人或物的深厚真挚感情。
(2)指具有深厚真挚的感情。
(3)仁惠。
(4)喜欢，爱好。
(5)指所喜爱的人。
(6)仰慕。
(7)爱护，关心。
(8)怜惜；爱惜。
(9)舍不得；吝惜。
(10)指男女间之爱恋。
(11)容易发生某种变化；常常发生某种行为。
(12)对别人的女儿的尊称。
(13)通“薆”、“”。隐蔽；障蔽。
(14)通“曖”。参见“愛景”。

愛字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　愛； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页395第13
〔古文〕???【唐韻】烏代切【集韻】【韻會】於代切【正韻】於蓋切，?同㤅。仁之發也。从心旡聲。又親也，恩也，惠也，憐也，寵也，好樂也，吝惜也，慕也，隱也。　又【孝經·諫諍章疏】愛者，奉上之通稱。　又【諡法】嗇於賜與曰愛。　又姓。宋刺史愛申。　又叶烏胃切，音穢。【詩·小雅】心乎愛矣，遐不謂矣。【楚辭·九章】世溷濁莫吾知，人心不可謂兮。知死不可讓，願勿愛兮。【袁宏·名臣贊】滄海橫流，玉石同碎。達人兼善，廢已存愛。【謝瞻·答靈運詩】尋塗塗旣睽，卽理理已對。絲路有恆悲，矧乃所在愛。　小篆作㤅。

愛字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ài］
["Guangyun" Udaiqie, go to generation, film. ]
Traditional characters for "爱1".
(1) Deep and sincere feelings for treating people or things.
(2) Refers to having deep and sincere feelings.
(3) Benevolence.
(4) Like, hobby.
(5) Refers to the person you like.
(6) Admiration.
(7) Love and care.
(8) Pity; Love.
(9) Reluctant; stingy.
(10) Refers to the love between men and women.
(11) Some kind of change is easy to happen; some kind of behavior often happens.
(12) The honorific title for someone else's daughter.
(13) Through "薆" and "". Concealed; obscured.
(14) Through "warming". See "Love King".
Love
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　爱; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 395 13
〔古文〕???【Tang Yun】Udaiqi 【Jiyun】【Rhyme Meeting】Yu Daiqie【Zhengyun】Yu Gaiqie, the same as 㤅. Renzhifa also. Sound from the heart. You are close to you, you are good, you are good, you are pity, you are pet, you are happy, you are stingy, you are fond of you, and you are hidden.　 Also [The Book of Filial Piety · Admonishment Chapter Shu] The lover, the general name given above.　 [Posthumous Law] Sorry to give and say love.　Another last name. Song Cishi Ai Shen.　Yewu's stomach is cut again, and the sound is dirty. [Poetry·Xiaoya] I am in love, so I am not too much. [The Songs of Chu·Nine Chapters] Mo I know that the world is muddled, and people's hearts are beyond words. Don't let me die, I hope you don't love me. [Yuan Hong·Famous Minister's Praise] The sea crosses the sea, and the jade is broken. Master both good and good, abolish the existing love. [Xie Zhan·Answers to Lingyun Poems] Looking for Tu Tu Yan Sui, the rationale is correct. The Silk Road has constant sorrow, but it is love.　小篆作㤅.

Name meaning

ài
вм. 爱
Radicals: 冖, 心, 夂  (forehead, heart, winter, cleat)
Meaning Mnemonic
Putting on cleats in the heart of winter and braving the harsh elements just to plant a kiss on your sweetheart’s forehead – that’s love. Sure, you could see them another day, but you need to plant this smooch on their forehead today, so you get some cleats for better grip on the winter snow and you keep thoughts of your dear in your heart as you travel to see your love.
Feel the joy of love in your heart as you travel out in the winter. It’s cold outside, but the feeling of love in your heart keeps you warm. Feel this warm love emanating and heating your body.
Reading Mnemonic
Walking through the winter snows with your cleats on, you’ve gotta keep your eye (あい) on the prize. It’s a really hard journey, but you keep your eye on the prize, which is your love and the time you’ll get to spend with them.
Imagine seeing your love with your own two eyes after a long time away from them. It feels great to be reunited and see eye to eye once again. Imagine this feeling.
